contentrichtext.text: '''Quaker Meeting''' may refer to: * [[Monthly meeting]] (or Area meeting in the UK), the basic organisational unit in the Religious Society of Friends (Quakers) * [[Preparative meeting]] (or Preparatory meeting; Local meeting in the UK), a common basic local worship group in the [[Religious Society of Friends]] * [[Meeting for worship]], a Quaker religious practice somewhat akin to a church service * [[Quaker Meeting (child's game)]], a children's game ==See also== * [[Friends meeting house]], where Quaker Meetings for worship often take place * [[List of Quaker meeting houses]] {{disambig}}
